name: Rise & Shine
description: Welcome to Gamearth, a once peaceful planet now threatened by the warmongering Space grunts of Nexgen. In the aftermath of their devastating first strike a child named Rise is forced to take on the sacred gun Shine - and with it the fate of his world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (32bit and 64-bit OS supported) Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB of Video Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated audio interface Additional Notes: Microsoft XBOX360 controller or compatible
